meta_title: Traction Business Book: The 2026 Industrial Implementation Guide
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to poor organizational structure. This guide translates the Traction business book into a high-uptime industrial strategy.
title: The Traction Business Book for Industry: Implementing EOS in Manufacturing and Maintenance Operations (2026 Guide)

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Traction Business Book for Industry: Implementing EOS in Manufacturing and Maintenance Operations (2026 Guide)

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic image of a diverse team of three industrial maintenance professionals—two men and one woman—standing in a clean, modern manufacturing facility. They are wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One professional is holding an industrial tablet, showing only the back of the device. They are standing near a large, well-maintained conveyor system and electric motors. The lighting is bright and professional, conveying a sense of organized, high-tech operational excellence. No text or logos in the image.
